project.title: Sample Project: 401(k) Research
project.goal: Explore why older working Americans do not maximize their employer 401(k) match
questions: Why does the interviewee not max out their 401(k)?
Does the interviewee understand how to manage their finances?
How much debt does the interviewee have outstanding?
What assets does the interviewee own?
What worries the interviewee about retirement?
